name: Brazier of Holy Flame
description: When a uniet flees within 12" on 4+ it does not flee.

name: Mastro Vivetti’s Magnificent Macroscope
description: Add 3" range to missile weapons when wholly within 12".

name: Shemtek’s Grimoire
description: Once per battle in hero phase. Roll D3 and enemy wisards subtracts that from casting rolls.

name: Flask of Lethisian Darkwater
description: Once per battle end of any phase. Heal D6 W.

name: Glimmering
description: Once per battle. Re-roll to-hit, to-wound or save.

name: Divine Champion
description: Becomes priest and know Hammer of Sigmar. Answer 4 Range 12" +1 to-wound for units wholly within.

name: Master of Ballistics
description: When issuing all-out attack missile weapons +1 to-wound in addition.

name: Fiery Temper
description: Re-roll charge and friendly wholly within 18" can also reroll.

name: Fireball
description: CV6 range 18" unit visible within roll 1 die for each model 6+MW.

name: Mystifying Miasma
description: CV5 range 24" unit visible within cannot run and -2 charge.

name: Pall of Doom
description: CV7 range 18" unit visible within cannot issue or recive commands.

name: Pha’s Protection
description: CV7 range 18" unit visible wholly within ignore modifies to save rolls.

name: Rain of Jade
description: CV7 range 12" visible wholly within roll 1 die for each lost wound 5+ heals that wound.

name: Transmutation of Lead
description: CV7 range 12" unit visible within roll 1 die for each model on save+ MW.

name: Twin-tailed Comet
description: CV7 range 18" unit visible within draw line from caster to model in enemy unit. Every friendly who passes the line 10B then D3MW.

name: Wildform
description: CV7 range 12" visible wholly within charge within 18" with 3D6.
